title: Scrolls
content:
creature you touch regains hit points equal to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier.

This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

Scroll of Feather Fall

Slow the rate of descent of allied creatures. Grants immunity to Falling damage.

Scroll of Ray of Sickness

Call forth of sickening energy. Deals 2d8 Poison damage and possibly Poisons the target.

Scroll of Invisibility

Touch a creature to turn it Invisible.

The spell ends early if the creature attacks or casts a spell.
